name: Jane Doe
bio: With over 15 years in tech policy and community organizing, Jane leads TECH-NEST with a passion for digital equity and accessible education.

name: John Smith
bio: A former cybersecurity journalist, John translates complex technical topics into engaging and understandable content for all audiences.

name: Emily Chen
bio: Emily builds and nurtures our community through events, partnerships, and outreach, ensuring our programs meet real-world needs.
